name: HKObject
desc: A piece of data that can be stored inside the HealthKit store.

items.name: var uuid: UUID
items.desc: The universally unique identifier (UUID) for this HealthKit object.

items.name: var metadata: [String : Any]?
items.desc: The metadata for this HealthKit object.

items.name: var device: HKDevice?
items.desc: The device that generated the data for this object.

items.name: var sourceRevision: HKSourceRevision
items.desc: The app or device that created this object.

items.name: let HKPredicateKeyPathUUID: String
items.desc: The key path for accessing the object’s UUID inside a predicate format string.

items.name: let HKPredicateKeyPathMetadata: String
items.desc: The key path for accessing the object’s metadata dictionary inside a predicate format string.
